meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.description: Ei Privacy Policy te bujhano hoyeche kibhabe Bnlang ar BPM amader website, documentation, registry, API, developer tool, ar community channel e data handle kore.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.intro: Ei Privacy Policy te bola ache amra ki information collect kori, kibhabe use kori, ar apnar ki choice ache. Bnlang, BPM, ba kono official website, registry, ba tool use korar madhyome apni ei Policy te described practice e consent dicchen.

sections.title: 1. Scope
body: Ei Policy apply hoy amader official website, documentation, package registry, developer tool (CLI ar BPM soho), API, ar community platform e jeta amra Bnlang project er jonne operate kori.
Eta third-party service ba library er jonne apply hoy na jeta amader ecosystem theke reference kora. Oigulo tar nijer privacy policy diye governed, apnake use korar age check korte hobe.

sections.title: 2. Information We Collect
body: • **Usage data**: page view, referring page, device/browser metadata, IP theke approximate location, ar timestamp. Eta reliability maintain, abuse detect, ar performance improve korte help kore.
• **Telemetry (optional)**: CLI ba tool theke anonymous, aggregated metrics (feature use, error rate). Telemetry kokhono mandatory na ar disable kora jay (dekhen Section 7).

• **Account ba community data**: jodi apni ekta account create koren ba community channel e interact koren, tahole amra apnar display name, email, profile detail, ar apnar submit kora content (issue, discussion, package, contribution) collect korte pari.
• **Cookies**: session ar preference enable korte functional cookie; analytics cookie sudhu jekhane law permit kore ar apnar setting respect kore.

sections.title: 3. How We Use Information
body: • Bnlang, BPM, doc, ar registry operate, maintain, ar improve korte.
• Infrastructure secure korte, abuse detect/stop korte, ar issue debug korte.
• Aggregate usage pattern bujhte, feature prioritize korte, ar developer experience improve korte.
• Critical update, security notice, new release, ba policy change communicate korte proper channel diye.

sections.title: 4. Legal Bases
body: Law (jemon GDPR) jekhane dorkar, amra nicher base e process kori:
• **Legitimate interest**: site security, spam prevention, service improvement.
• **Consent**: optional telemetry, analytics cookie, ba marketing communication er jonne.
• **Contract**: apnake requested service provide korte (BPM account, registry publish).
• **Legal obligation**: court order, law enforcement, ba regulatory requirement follow korte.

sections.title: 5. Sharing & Disclosure
body: Amra apnar personal information sell kori na.
Trusted service provider (hosting, CDN, analytics, CI/CD, error reporting) er sathe limited data share korte pari contract er under e jeta tarai protect korte obligated.
Law, legal process, ba user ar infrastructure er safety/rights protect korte dorkar hole amra information disclose korte pari.

sections.title: 6. Data Retention
body: Information sudhu oi purpose er jonne rakhbo jeta ei Policy te bola ache.
Usage log ar telemetry usually 30–180 din er moddhe diagnostic jonne rakha hoy ar pore aggregate ba delete kora hoy.
Account data apnar account active thakle retain hobe. Account delete korle related personal data remove ba anonymize kora hobe jodi na law e retention require kore.

sections.title: 7. Your Choices
body: • **Telemetry**: CLI flag ba environment variable (e.g., `BNL_TELEMETRY=0`) diye opt-out korte parben.
• **Cookies**: browser setting ba amader consent banner diye manage korte parben (jodi applicable hoy).
• **Account data**: official channel ba GitHub/community diye maintainer der contact kore update ba delete request korte parben.
• **Communication**: non-essential email theke unsubscribe link ba preference diye opt-out korte parben.

sections.title: 8. Security
body: Amra reasonable technical, organizational, ar administrative safeguard use kori information protect korte (HTTPS, access control, limited retention).
Kono system fully secure na. Apni jodi kono vulnerability find koren, responsibly report korun amader security disclosure process diye.

sections.title: 9. International Transfers
body: Amader infrastructure ar service provider multiple country te thakte pare. Data border cross hole amra proper safeguard nibo law onujayi (standard contractual clause jekhane dorkar).

sections.title: 10. Children’s Privacy
body: Bnlang ar Services 13 bochor er niche child er jonne na, ba apnar jurisdiction e parental consent dorkar thakle tar age er child er jonne na.
Amra knowingly child theke personal data collect kori na. Jodi amra aware hoy, amra data promptly delete kore debo.

sections.title: 11. Third-Party Links
body: Amader documentation, registry, ba website e third-party site/service link thakte pare. Egulo content ba privacy practice er jonne amra responsible na. Apni third-party policy review kore niben data share korar age.

sections.title: 12. Changes to This Policy
body: Amra periodically ei Privacy Policy update korte pari. Upore date e last revision dekhano ache.
Important change hole amra extra notice dibo (website e, release note e, ba announcement e).
Change effect howar por continue use korle mane hobe apni revised Policy accept korechen.

sections.title: 13. Contact
body: Ei Policy niye question ba request? Apni korte paren:
• Official GitHub repository te issue open korun.
• Website e listed official community channel diye contact korun.
• Legal/privacy inquiry er jonne repository ba documentation e deya specific email diye maintainer der contact korun.
